'Marco Fu Ka-chun' (; Yale: Fu6 Ga1 Jeun3; born 8 January
1978 in Hong Kong), commonly known as 'Marco Fu', is a professional snooker
player from Hong Kong. He is best known for winning the 2007 Grand Prix, beating
Ronnie O'Sullivan in the final, and for being runner-up in the 2008 UK
Championship and the 2011 Masters. He also reached the semi-finals of the 2006
World Championship. He currently resides in Happy Valley.
